componentDescription: A customizable dropdown list with optional search functionality.

id.description: Unique identifier for the ComboBox, required for accessibility.

name.description: Optional name attribute for the ComboBox, useful when submitted in a form.

items.description: Array of ComboBox items that the user can select from.

onSelect.description: Optional callback function triggered when an item is selected.

searchEnabled.description: Flag to enable search functionality within the ComboBox.

left.description: Optional element to display on the left side of the ComboBox.

right.description: Optional element to display on the right side of the ComboBox.

label.description: Optional label to describe the purpose of the ComboBox.

showTick.description: Flag to show a tick mark next to selected items.

placeholder.description: Text to display when nothing has been selected in the ComboBox.

styles.description: Optional custom styles to apply to the ComboBox.

searchPlaceholder.description: Placeholder text for the search input when search is enabled.

[x: string].description: Allows the ComboBox to receive any additional properties.
